name: X-Ray
details: The X-Ray Department helps doctors take pictures of the inside of your body to see bones, muscles, and organs. It's quick, painless, and helps doctors diagnose injuries or conditions accurately.

name: Neurology
details: The Neurology Department cares for kids with brain, nerve, or muscle issues. Doctors use special tools and tests to understand the brain and nervous system and help children stay healthy.

name: Pediatrics
details: The Pediatrics Department is where doctors take care of children and teens. From check-ups to treating illnesses, our team makes sure kids grow healthy and strong.

name: Cardiology
details: The Cardiology Department focuses on the heart. Doctors here check, diagnose, and treat heart conditions to keep young patients' hearts healthy.

name: Orthopedics
details: The Orthopedics Department helps children with bones, muscles, and joints. Whether it’s a fracture, injury, or posture problem, our team provides expert care.

name: Dermatology
details: The Dermatology Department treats skin conditions like rashes, acne, or allergies. Doctors help kids keep their skin healthy and comfortable.

name: Ophthalmology
details: The Ophthalmology Department takes care of kids’ eyes and vision. Doctors check eyesight and treat problems like nearsightedness or eye infections.

name: ENT
details: The ENT Department treats ear, nose, and throat problems in children. Doctors handle infections, hearing issues, and other related conditions.
